resource.chars:
H.M.S. Bulwark 
Channel Fleet 
22.10.08
Dear Sir Archibald 
Thank you for your letter of the 20th
I am very much obliged to you for the 
corrections you have suggested for mine 
I have adopted all in the amended version 
I transmit (in duplicate) herewith.
I agree that the sentences you struck out 
did not strengthen the case and therefore 
that it is better taste as well as better 
policy to omit them 
Indignation is liable to superfluous expression 
and I am grateful to you for the 
curb -
Yours truly 
R. Scott
